suggestions: Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination. The confidentiality obligations set forth in this Agreement shall survive the termination or expiration of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
originalTexts: Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination.
